text: Boyhood (styled as BOYHOOD) is the debut mini album by South Korean boy band, UNB. It was released on 7 April 2018 by Interpark. This mini album consists of six songs and two of them were the lead singles – "Feeling" (감각) and "Only One". ==Track listing== == Release history == Country/territory Date Format Company/distributor Ref. South Korea 7 April 2018 Interpark Japan Worldwide South Korea 10 April 2018 CD Worldwide Taiwan 11 April 2018 Japan 13 April 2018 ==References== ==Other websites== * Music pages: * * Category:2018 albums *[Ref.]: Reference
title: Boyhood (EP)
